D3.js experimentation ~ A work in progress

Travels


To zoom: double click or scroll on the map.

If the map is blank, please reload the page.

Objectives:

  • Display a world map
  • Color the countries I visited
  • Manage overlapping trips
  • Add the main cities
  • Add a zoom
  • Contain map on zoom
  • Limit the map drag and drop
  • Group the cities by trip: colors, lines
  • Add useful tooltips
  • Add some cool graphic animations
